name: Animal Crossing: Tier List Maker V2
name_original: Animal Crossing: Tier List Maker V2
description:
First off, legal disclaimer! This is an unofficial project. I am not affiliated with Nintendo. Animal Crossing™ is a trademark of Nintendo.

A fan-made project where you can easily rank all 413 villagers in Animal Crossing: New Horizons in a streamlined and effortless way! I originally made this project to provide an alternative for those clunky web-based tier makers, since they aren’t suited for ranking more than a few dozen items.

Features:

  • Rank and sort all 413 villagers present in Animal Crossing: New Horizons in a streamlined way
  • View individual passport profiles of each villager, learning several details about them
  • Generate a shareable screenshot of your finished list
  • Interact with a UI closely emulating that of Animal Crossing: New Horizons
